document_data.name: Speaker's Palace
document_data.mainbody: The '''Speaker's Palace''' was the personal residence of the Speaker of [[Bryn Shander]], the individual who represented the settlement to the rest of the [[Ten Towns]].
document_data.Geography: This residence was located a bit south of the center of town.
document_data.Structure: The "palace" was made of [[dwarven]] design, constructed with stone walls and a slate roof. Its facade featured a notable colonnade that contributed to its out-of-place appearance among the other structures of Bryn Shander.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1351}}, a great battle took place in Bryn Shander between a barbarian horde and the folks of the Town Towns accompanied by the [[Companions of the Hall]]. Following the conflict, the ''Speaker's Palace'' was gifted to the adventurer [[Regis]].
document_data.Notable Inhabitants:
* [[Cassius]], Speaker circa [[1351 DR]]
* Regis, the [[halfling]] adventurer
* [[Duvessa Shane]], Speaker as of [[1485 DR]]
